S04n3003:1: evaṁ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma |
S04n3003:2: gṛdhrakūṭe parvate 'nanta- ratnaśikhare dharmadhātugarbhe prāsāde mahatā bhikṣu- saṁghena sārdhaṁ pañaviṁśatibhir bhikṣusahasraiḥ |
S04n3003:3: sarvair arhadbhiḥ kṣīnāsravair niḥkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñair ājāneyair mahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtayaiḥ kṛta- karaṇīyair apahṛtabhārair anuprāptasvakārthaiḥ parikṣīṇa- bhavasaṁyojanaiḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaiḥ sarvacetovaśi- paramapāramiprāptaiḥ |
S04n3003:7: dhana- śriyā ca buddhiśriyā ca bhaiṣajyarājena ca bhaiṣajyasamu- dgatena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena |
S04n3003:18: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavata etad abhūt |
S04n3003:20: ahaṁ bodhisattvānāṁ mahāsattvānāṁ mahājavabala- vegasthāmasaṁjananārthaṁ dhārmīṁ kathāṁ kathayeyam,
S04n3003:21: yad gaṅgānadīvālikāsamebhyo lokadhātubhyo mahaujaska- mahaujaskān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān saṁnipāteyam |
S04n3003:22: yan nv ahaṁ mahādharmanirdeśasya paridīpanāyai nimittam ādarśayeyam,
S04n3003:24: yan me bodhisattvā mahāsattvā āgatya mahādharmanirdeśaṁ paripṛccheyur iti |
S04n3003:25: atha khalu bhagavāṁs tasyāṁ velāyāṁ daśasu dikṣv asaṁ- khyeyācintyatrisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥ- samaṁ lokadhātuṁ mahāraśmimeghair avabhāsayati sma |
S04n3003:26: tena khalu punaḥ samayena daśabhyo digbhya ekaikasmād digbhāgād daśabuddhakṣetrānabhilāpyakoṭīniyutaśatasahasra- paramāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā āgacchanti sma |
S04n3003:27: (2) teṣām ekaiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'cintyābhir bodhisattva- vikurvaṇābhir āgatya bhagavato 'nurūpām acintyāṁ pūjāṁ kṛtvā svakasvakapraṇidhānabalanirjāteṣu padmāsaneṣu bhagavataḥ purato nyaṣīdan |
S04n3003:29: tena khalu punaḥ samayena dharmadhātugarbhe prāsāda- madhye mahāratnapadmagarbhasiṁhāsanaṁ prādurabhūt |
S04n3003:41: tasya ca mahāmaṇiratnapadmagarbhasiṁhāsanasyopari samantād daśāsaṁkhyeyāni raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti sma |
S04n3003:42: te ca raśmayo daśasu dikṣv anyonyān lokadhātūn mahatāvabhāsena spharanti sma |
S04n3003:43: tena khalu punaḥ samayena daśadiśy ekaikasmād digbhāgād daśabuddhakṣetrānabhilāpyakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparamāṇu- rajaḥsamā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramaho- ragaśakrabrahmalokapālā āgacchanti sma |
S04n3003:57: āgatya ca bhagavato 'cintyātulyāmāpyāṁ parimāṇā- bhikrāntāṁ pūjāṁ kṛtvā,
S04n3003:59: niṣīdya bhagavantam animiṣaṁ nirīkṣantaḥ sthitā abhūvan |
S04n3003:60: tena khalu punaḥ samayenāyaṁ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur jāmbūnadasuvarṇamayaḥ saṁsthito 'bhūt |
S04n3003:61: nānā- mahāmaṇiratnavṛkṣair divyaiḥ puṣpavṛkṣair vastravṛkṣair uragasāracandanagandhavṛkṣair alaṁkṛtaḥ,
S04n3003:64: sarvavṛkṣāś cāsaṁkhyeyāpsaraḥkoṭīniyutaśata- sahasrārdhakāyikā muktāhāraparigṛhītā mahāmaṇiratnadāma- parigṛhītāḥ sthitā abhūvan ||
S04n3003:65: (4) tena khalu punaḥ samayena tato mahāmaṇiratnapadma- garbhāt siṁhāsanād imā gāthā niścaranti sma |
S04n3003:66: āgaccha niṣīda narendrarājā ahaṁ hi te puṇyabalena udgataḥ |
S04n3003:67: saṁpūrṇasaṁkalpa ahaṁ tvam adya saṁdhārayiṣye dvipadottamaṁ jinam || 1 ||
S04n3003:69: mamātmabhāvo ratanāmayo hy ayaṁ ratnaikapadmaṁ mama madhyasaṁsthitam |
S04n3003:70: manoramaṁ tubhya kṛtena nāyakāḥ saṁkalpa pūrehi mamādya tāyinaḥ || 2 ||
S04n3003:72: niṣadya ratnāmayi padmi asmiṁ śobhehi māṁ sarvam imaṁ ca lokam |
S04n3003:73: deśehi dharmaṁ bahuprāṇikoṭināṁ yaṁ śruta siṁhāsana īdṛśaṁ labhet || 3 ||
S04n3003:75: raśmī sahasrā tava gātrasaṁbhavāḥ prabhāsayanto bahulokadhātum |
S04n3003:76: prāmodyajātasya hi lakṣaṇam imaṁ samākramā mahya kṛtena nāyakāḥ || 4 ||
S04n3003:78: (5) kṣipraṁ niṣīdasva kuruṣva 'nugrahaṁ pūrvaṁ mayā dhārita aṣṭakoṭiyaḥ |
S04n3003:79: asmin pradeśe munināṁ svayaṁbhuvāṁ bhagavan pīhādya karotv anugraham || 5 ||
S04n3003:81: atha khalu bhagavān utthāya pūrvakād āsanāt tatra mahāratnapadmagarbhe siṁhāsane niṣadya paryaṅkaṁbaddhī sarvāvantaṁ bodhisattvagaṇaṁ svavalokayati sma |
S04n3003:82: sāmutkar- ṣikāyāś ca dharmadeśanāyās teṣāṁ bodhisattvānāṁ mahā- sattvānāṁ nimittam akārṣīt |
S04n3003:83: tena khalu punaḥ samayena sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇa evaṁ cintayati sma |
S04n3003:84: yan nv ayaṁ mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto 'nutpādānirodhaṁ tathāgatam arhantaṁ samyaksaṁbuddhaṁ paripṛcchet,
S04n3003:86: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavato 'ntikān nimittaṁ viditvā teṣāṁ ca bodhisattvānāṁ mahāsattvānāṁ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya bhagavantam etad avocat |
S04n3003:96: samāgateme bahubodhisattvā jñānārthinas tvāṁ ca vibho 'bhivanditum |
S04n3003:97: saṁpreṣitā lokavināyakebhir deśehi saddharmam udāram uttamam || 3 ||
S04n3003:99: evam ukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṁ kumārabhūtam etad avocat |
S04n3003:101: sādhu khalu punas tvaṁ mañjuśrīs tathāgatam etam arthaṁ paripraṣṭavyaṁ manyase |
S04n3003:102: bahujanahitāya tvaṁ mañjuśrīḥ pratipanno bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṁ ca manuṣyāṇāṁ caitarhy āgatānāṁ ca bodhi- sattvānāṁ mahāsattvānāṁ buddhabhūmiprāpaṇārtham |
S04n3003:103: an- uttrāsas te mañjuśrīr asmin sthāne yogaḥ karaṇīyo na (7)
S04n3003:108: tadyathā mañjuśrīr iyaṁ mahāpṛthivī mahāvaiḍūryamayī saṁsthitā bhavet |
S04n3003:109: evaṁ ca saṁsthitā bhaved yathā tasyāṁ vaiḍūryamayāṁ mahāpṛthivyāṁ trayastriṁśadbhavanasya,
S04n3003:112: śakraś ca devānām indras tatra divyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ krīḍan ramamāṇaḥ paricārayan saṁdṛśyet |
S04n3003:113: atha tasmin samaye devāḥ sarvajambūdvīpakāḥ strīpu- ruṣadārakadārikāḥ saṁcodayeyuḥ |
S04n3003:115: paśyatemaṁ śakraṁ devānām indraṁ vaijayante prāsāde divyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ krīḍantaṁ ramantaṁ pari- cārayantam |
S04n3003:119: īdṛśeṣu vaijayanteṣu prāsādeṣu krīḍiṣyatha ramiṣyatha paricāra- yiṣyatha śakratvāni ca kariṣyatha |
S04n3003:121: yādṛśyā ca śakro devānām indro divyaiḥ paribhogaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūta iti |
S04n3003:122: atha mañjuśrīs te strīpuruṣadārakadārikās tasyāṁ vai- ḍūryamayāṁ mahāpṛthivyāṁ trayastriṁśadbhavanasya,
S04n3003:124: śakrasya devānām indrasya prati- bhāsaṁ dṛṣṭvāñjalipragṛhaṁ kuryuḥ |
S04n3003:126: gandhāṁś ca kṣiperann evaṁ vācaṁ bhāṣante |
S04n3003:127: vayam apy evaṁrūpā bhavema yādṛśaḥ śakro devānām indraḥ,
S04n3003:128: vayam apy evaṁ vaijayante prāsāde krīḍema ramema parivārayema yathāyaṁ śakro devānām indra iti |
S04n3003:129: na ca te sattvā evaṁ saṁjānanti sma |
S04n3003:130: pratibhāso 'yaṁ vaiḍūryamayāṁ mahāpṛthivyāṁ yatra trayastriṁśadbhava- nam,
S04n3003:132: śakraś ca devānām indraḥ pariśuddhatvād mahāvaiḍūryasya pratibhāsaḥ saṁdṛśyata iti |
S04n3003:133: te śakratvam abhinandanto dānāni ca dadati,
S04n3003:136: tatra ca trayastriṁśadbhavane pratibhāsa upapattaye kuśalamūlāni ca pariṇāmayanti |
S04n3003:137: yathā mañjuśrīḥ tatra ca vaiḍūryamayāṁ mahā- pṛthivyāṁ nāsti tatra trayastriṁśadbhavanam,
S04n3003:140: api tu pari- śuddhatvād mahāvaiḍūryasya saṁdṛśyate trayastriṁśadbha- vanam,
S04n3003:143: sa cāsan notpanno na niruddhaḥ pariśuddhatvād mahā- vaiḍūryasya pratibhāsaḥ saṁdṛśyate |
S04n3003:144: evam eva mañjuśrīḥ pariśuddhatvāc cittasya subhāvitatvād bhāvanāyāḥ sattvānāṁ tathāgatātmabhāvadarśanaṁ bhavati |
S04n3003:146: sa cābhūto 'nutpanno 'niruddho na bhāvo nābhāvo na dṛśyo nādṛśyo na lokyo nālokyo na caityo nācaityo na san nāsan |
S04n3003:147: atha ca mañjuśrīḥ sattvās tathāgatapratibhāsam āramba- ṇīkṛtvā puṣpāṇi kṣipanti,
S04n3003:150: vayam apy evaṁrūpā bhavema yādṛśas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṁbuddha iti |
S04n3003:151: te buddha- jñānābhilāṣiṇo dānāni ca dadati,
S04n3003:156: tadyathā mañjuśrīs tatra mahā- vaiḍūryamayāṁ mahāpṛthivyāṁ śakrasya devānām indrasya pratibhāso neñjati,
S04n3003:162: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho neñjati,
S04n3003:169: atha ca pratibimba iva lokeṣu dṛśyate |
S04n3003:172: paripācanādhimukti- balādhānatayā bodhibhājaneṣu sattveṣu pratibhāsaprāpto bhavati |
S04n3003:176: tadyathā mañjuśrīr devānāṁ trayastriṁśānāṁ puṇyabala- pariniṣpannānāṁ dharmaśabdānāṁ mahādharmadundubhir upari vaijayantasya prasādasyāntarīkṣagatā cakṣuḥpatha- samatikrāntā,
S04n3003:179: atha ca punar mañjuśrīḥ sā mahādharmadundubhiḥ |
S04n3003:180: yasmin (10) samaye devās trayastriṁśatkāyikā tīvrasatatasamitaṁ divyaiḥ kāmakrīḍāratiparibhogaiḥ pramattā bhavanti,
S04n3003:181: na bhūyaḥ sudharmāyāṁ devasabhāyāṁ praviśya dharmaṁ saṁgāyanti,
S04n3003:182: śakraś ca yadā devānām indro divyaiḥ kāmakrīḍaratipari- bhogaiḥ pramatto bhavati,
S04n3003:184: tasmin samaye mañjuśrīḥ sā mahādharmadundubhir adṛṣyā cā nālokyā cakṣuḥpathasamatikrāntāntarīkṣagatā tādṛśaṁ dharmaśabdaṁ niścārayati |
S04n3003:185: yena ca dharmaśabdena sarvāṁs trayastriṁśatkāyikān devān svareṇa vijñapayati |
S04n3003:186: anityā mārṣā rūpaśabdagandharasasparśā mā pramattacāriṇo bhavatha |
S04n3003:190: śūnyā mārṣāḥ sarvasaṁskārā mā pramādam āpadyatha |
S04n3003:191: duḥkham itaś cyavitānāṁ punar atropapattir bhaviṣyati |
S04n3003:197: mārṣā viharatha yūyaṁ punar ebhir evaṁ divyaiḥ kāma- krīḍāratiparibhogaiḥ,
S04n3003:199: tena khalu punar mañjuśrīḥ samayena tasyā adṛśyā arūpiṇyā akalpyāyā avikalpāyāś cakṣuḥpathasamatikrāntāyā anutpannāniruddhāyā vākpathasamatikrāntāyāś cittamano- vijñānāpagatāyā mahādharmadundubheḥ śabdena sarve trayastriṁśatkāyikā devāḥ saṁcoditā bhītās trastā udvi- (11)
S04n3003:200: gnodvignāḥ sudharmāyāṁ devasabhāyāṁ praviśya dharmā- rāmaratiratā viharanti |
S04n3003:206: śakraś ca devānām indras tasmin samaye sudharmāyāṁ devasabhāyāṁ praviśya dharmāsane niṣadya dharmaṁ deśayati |
S04n3003:207: yadā ca mañjuśrīr asurā devaiḥ sārdhaṁ saṁgrāmayanti |
S04n3003:208: tatra yadā trayastriṁśā devāḥ parābhavaṁ gacchanti |
S04n3003:210: yena śabdenāsurā bhītās trastā udvignodvignāḥ palāyanti |
S04n3003:211: na ca mañjuśrīs tasyā mahādharmadundubheḥ kaścit saṁpādayitā vātmabhāvo vā saṁvidyate |
S04n3003:212: adṛśyā mañjuśrīḥ sā mahādharmadundubhir anālokyā satyābhūtācittācetanā- nimittārūpiṇyarutānātma bhāvādvayā cakṣuḥpathasamati- krāntā |
S04n3003:213: atha ca mañjuśrīs trayastriṁśatkāyikānāṁ devaputrāṇāṁ pūrvaparikarmakṛtānāṁ mahādharmadundubheḥ śabdo niś- carati |
S04n3003:215: yathā mañjuśrīs tasyā mahādundubher adṛśyo 'nātma- bhāvo 'nālokyo 'sann abhūto 'cinto 'cetano 'nimitto (12)
S04n3003:217: pūrva- karmavipākena trayastriṁśatkāyikānāṁ devaputrāṇāṁ sarvo- padravopāyāsopakleśopaśāntaye śabdo niścarati |
S04n3003:219: sa ca dharma- śabdas trayastriṁśatkāyikānāṁ devaputrāṇāṁ sarvopadravo- pāyāsopakleśopaśāntaye saṁvartate |
S04n3003:220: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṁbuddho 'dṛśyo 'nālokyo 'nātmabhāvo 'sann abhūto 'citto 'cetano 'nimitto 'rūpy aruto 'dvayo 'bhāvaś cakṣuḥpathasamatikrāntaḥ |
S04n3003:221: atha ca mañjuśrīḥ sattvāḥ pūrvakarmavipākena yathāśayā- dhimuktyā dharmaśabdaṁ niścarantaṁ saṁjānanti |
S04n3003:222: sa ca dharmaśabdaḥ sarvasattvānāṁ sarvopadravopāyāsopakleśo- paśāntaye saṁvartate |
S04n3003:223: dharmasvaranirghoṣeṇa tathāgata- ghoṣasvara iti loke saṁkhyāṁ gacchati |
S04n3003:225: atha ca dharmasvara- ghoṣena tathāgata iti prajñaptir loke saṁbhavati |
S04n3003:226: sattvānām eva pūrvakuśalakarmavipākena tathāgataśabdaṁ niścarantaṁ sattvāḥ saṁjānanti |
S04n3003:227: sarvasattvānāṁ sarvasukhajananārthaṁ pramattānāṁ ca saṁcodanārthaṁ śabdo niścarati |
S04n3003:228: te mañjuśrīḥ sattvāḥ śabdaṁ śrutvā tathāgataṁ saṁkalpayanti |
S04n3003:230: ādikarmikāṇāṁ ca bodhisattvānāṁ sarvabālapṛthagjanā- nāṁ ca tathāgatārambaṇakuśalamūlasaṁjananārthaṁ tathā- gatavāk śrūyate |
S04n3003:231: api tv anutpanno 'niruddho mañjuśrīs tathāgato veditavyaḥ ||
S04n3003:232: (13) tadyathā mañjuśrīr nidāghakālāvasāne varṣāṇāṁ prathame māsy āgate sattvānāṁ pūrvakarmavipākena pṛthivīgatānāṁ bījagrāmabhūtagrāmasya sarvatṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatīnāṁ saṁjananārtham upari vaihāyasy āntarīkṣa ākāśe tādṛśā vayāvo vānti |
S04n3003:235: tena ca sarvī mahāpṛthivī saṁtarpitā bhavati |
S04n3003:236: sarve jambūdvīpakāś ca sattvās tasmin samaye pramuditā bhavanti |
S04n3003:239: yasmin khalu punar mañjuśrīḥ samaya upary antarīkṣād mahān udakaskandho na nipatati,
S04n3003:240: tasmin samaye sarvajam- būdvīpakāḥ sattvā evaṁ cintayanti |
S04n3003:242: yadā tu mañjuśrīr upary antarīkṣād mahān vāriskandho mahāpṛthivyāṁ nipatati,
S04n3003:244: aho mahāmegho vāri pramuñcati saṁtarpayati mahāpṛthivīm iti |
S04n3003:245: na punar atra mañjuśrīr megho vā meghaprajñaptir vā vidyate |
S04n3003:246: vāta- saṁjanito mañjuśrīr upary antarīkṣād mahān udakaskandho nipatati |
S04n3003:249: yathā mañjuśrīs tasya vāriskandhasyopary antarīkṣe vāta- saṁkṣobheṇa saṁvāryamāṇasya muñcato vāri megha iti pra- jñaptir bhavati |
S04n3003:251: na punar atra mañjusrīr meghaḥ saṁvidyate,
S04n3003:254: evam eva mañjuśrīḥ pūrvakuśalamūlasaṁbhāropacitānāṁ bodhisattvānāṁ mahāsattvānāṁ cānyeṣāṁ ca sattvānāṁ śrāva- kapratyekabuddhajñānābhiprāṇām avaropitakuśalamūlānāṁ ca sattvānāṁ nirvāṇamārgasaṁdarśanahetukānām āsaṁga- pratibhānas tathāgato 'rhan samyakṣaṁbuddho loka utpanna iti saṁkhyāṁ gacchati |
S04n3003:255: sa yad bhāṣate tat sarvaṁ tathā- vitathānanyathā,
S04n3003:256: tasya devamanuṣyeṣu tathāgata iti nāma kṛtam |
S04n3003:257: atha ca mañjuśrīḥ śabdo niścarati devamanuṣyeṣu yaduta tathāgata iti |
S04n3003:259: animitto mañjuśrīs tathāgato nimittāpagato na deśastho na videśasthaḥ,
S04n3003:261: tat khalu punar mañjuśrīs tathāgatapratibhāsaḥ sadevakaṁ lokaṁ dharmeṇa saṁtarpayitvā saṁpravārayitvā,
S04n3003:262: ādikarmikāṇāṁ ca bodhisattvānāṁ cānyeṣāṁ ca sarvabālapṛthagjanānāṁ nirvāṇavainayikānāṁ pūrvakarmavipākenādarśanābhāso bhavati |
S04n3003:265: na mañjuśrīs tathāgata utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā |
S04n3003:269: śrīr udakārambaṇenābhūtasya meghasyānutpannāniruddha- syāsato meghaprajñaptiḥ sthitā loke megha iti |
S04n3003:270: evam eva mañjuśrīr dharmadeśanārambaṇenābhūtasya tathāgatasyānut- pannānuruddhasyāsata ādita evājātasya nāmaprajñaptiḥ sthitā loke tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṁbuddha iti ||
S04n3003:271: tadyathāpi mañjuśrīr mahābrahmānabhibhūr daśatrisāha- sramahāsāhasravaśavartī divase divase sarvadevanikāyān vyavalokayati,
S04n3003:273: tena khalu punar mañjuśrīḥ samayena tasya mahābrahmaṇo daśatrisāhasramahāsāhasravaśavartinaḥ sarvadevanikāyān vyavalokayataḥ,
S04n3003:274: sarvadevanikāyeṣu sarvadevaputrāḥ svaka- svakān kāmakrīḍāratiparibhogāṁs tyaktvā sarvatūryatāḍā- vacarasaṁgītiṁ śamayitvā,
S04n3003:275: kāmakrīḍāratimanasikārotsṛṣṭāḥ sagauravā añjaliṁ pragṛhya mahābrahmāṇam animiṣaṁ vyavalokayanti |
S04n3003:276: sa ca mahābrahmā sarvadevanikāyeṣu muhurtaṁ darśanaṁ dadāti |
S04n3003:277: te ca devaputrās tasmin samaye mahābrahmalokopapattim ākāṅkṣanti,
S04n3003:279: sa ca mañjuśrīr mahābrahmācyavamānas tato brahma- vimānād anyam adhitiṣṭhati mahābrahmāṇaṁ daśatrisāhasra- mahāsāhasravaśavartinaṁ pūrvapraṇidhānādhiṣṭhānena teṣāṁ ca devaputrāṇāṁ pūrvakuśalamūlopacayena |
S04n3003:280: (16) sa ca mañjuśrīr nirmito mahābrahmā divase divase sarva- devanikāyān vyavalokayati,
S04n3003:282: tena khalu punar mañjuśrīḥ samayena sarveṣu devanikāyeṣu sarvadevaputrāḥ svakasvakān kāmakrīḍārati- paribhogāṁs tyaktvā sarvatūryatāḍāvacarasaṁgītiṁ praśa- mayitvā,
S04n3003:283: kāmakrīḍāratimanasikārotsṛṣṭāḥ sagauravā añjaliṁ pragṛhya mahābrahmāṇam animiṣaṁ vyavalokayanti sma |
S04n3003:284: sa ca mahābrahmā sarvadevanikāyeṣu muhūrtaṁ darśanaṁ dadāti,
S04n3003:286: te ca devaputrās tasmin samaye mahābrahmalokopapattim ākāṅkṣanti,
S04n3003:290: atha ca mañjuśrīḥ sarvadevanikāyeṣu darśanābhāso bhavati,
S04n3003:291: tasyaiva mahābrahmaṇaḥ pūrvakuśalamūlapraṇidhānādhiṣṭhā- nena teṣāṁ ca devaputrāṇāṁ pūrvakuśalamūlopacayena |
S04n3003:292: na ca mañjuśrīs teṣāṁ devaputrāṇām evaṁ bhavati |
S04n3003:295: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato'py arhan samyaksaṁbuddhaḥ śūnyo vaśiko 'bhūto 'nakṣaro 'ghoṣo 'deśo 'bhāvo 'cintyo 'nimittaś cittamanovijñānāpagato 'nutpanno 'niruddhaḥ |
S04n3003:296: atha ca punar mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṁbuddhaḥ pūrva- (17)
S04n3003:298: ādikarmiṇāṁ ca bo- dhisattvānāṁ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānasaṁprasthitā- nāṁ ca sarvabālapṛthagjanānāṁ sarvakuśalamūlādhiṣṭhānena lakṣaṇaśatasahasrālaṁkṛtas tathāgataḥ pratibimbam iva loke saṁdṛśyate,
S04n3003:300: na ca mañjuśrīr ādikarmikāṇāṁ ca bodhisattvānāṁ sarva- śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikānāṁ sarvabālapṛthagjanā- nāṁ caivaṁ bhavati |
S04n3003:302: atha ca mañjuśrīs tathāgatātmabhāvāl lakṣaṇaśatasahasrālaṁkṛtāt sarvatathāgateryāpatheṣu śūnyeṣu nānāvidhivicitrāṇāṁ nānādhimuktānāṁ sattvānāṁ mahā- dharmadeśānā niścarati |
S04n3003:303: sā ca dharmadeśanā sarvasattvānāṁ sarvopadravopāyāsopakleśopaśāntaye saṁvartate |
S04n3003:304: tatra ca tathāgataḥ samayaḥ sarvatropekṣako nirvikalpo nirviśeṣaḥ |
S04n3003:305: tad anenāpi te mañjuśrīḥ paryāyeṇaivaṁ veditavyam,
S04n3003:307: atha khalu bhagavāṁs tasyāṁ velāyām ime gāthe abhāṣat |
S04n3003:308: (18) anutpādadharmaḥ satataṁ tathāgataḥ sarve ca dharmāḥ sugatena sādṛśāḥ |
S04n3003:309: nimittagrāheṇa tu bālabuddhayo asatsu dharmeṣu caranti loke || 1 ||
S04n3003:311: tathāgato hi pratibimbabhūtaḥ kuśalasya dharmasya anāsravasya |
S04n3003:312: na cātra tathatā na tathāgato 'sti bimbaṁ ca saṁdṛśyati sarvaloke || 2 ||
S04n3003:314: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ sūryaraśmayo jambūdvīpe pūrvataram evatāvad mahāśailendrarājānam avabhāsayanti |
S04n3003:317: tataḥ paścād iha jambūdvīpe nimnān pṛthivīpradeśān avabhāsayanti |
S04n3003:318: te ca mañjuśrīḥ sūryaraśmayo na kalpayanti,
S04n3003:339: atha ca punar mañjuśrīḥ pṛthivyām uccanīcamadhyaviśeṣeṇa hīnamadhyot- kṛṣṭāvabhāsasya cchāyā vaicitryaṁ bhavati |
S04n3003:340: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'py arhan samyaksaṁbuddho na kalpayati,
S04n3003:379: atha ca punar mañjuśrīs tathāgatasūryamaṇḍalajñānaraś- mayas traidhātuke 'nantamadhyadharmadhātvapratihataraś- myavabhāsapramuktāḥ |
S04n3003:380: prasṛtāś ca raśmayaḥ pūrvataram eva mahāśailendrakalpādhyāśayānāṁ bodhisattvānāṁ kāye nipatanti |
S04n3003:383: tataḥ paścāt kuśalādhyāśayānāṁ yathādhi- muktīnāṁ sattvānāṁ kāye nipatanti |
S04n3003:384: tataḥ paścād antaśo mithyātvaniyateṣu sattvasaṁtāneṣu kāye tathāgatasūryamaṇḍala- raśmayo nipatanti |
S04n3003:387: tatra ca tathāgato mañjuśrīḥ samaḥ sarvatropekṣako nirvikalpo nirviśeṣaḥ |
S04n3003:388: na punar mañjuśrīs tathāgatajñāna- sūryamaṇḍalasyaivaṁ bhavati |
S04n3003:399: ayam udārāśayādhimuktikaḥ sattvo 'sya mahāyānaṁ deśa- yiṣyāmi |
S04n3003:402: kuśalākuśalāśayānāṁ ca sattvānām āśayaṁ viditvā viśodhayiṣyāmi,
S04n3003:404: yāvad mithyātvaniyatānām api sattvānāṁ yathānurūpaṁ dharmaṁ deśayiṣyāmi |
S04n3003:408: atha ca mañjuśrīḥ sattvānāṁ kuśalāśayasaṁtānavaicitryāt tathāgatajñānasūryamaṇḍalaraś- myavabhāsasya vaicitryaṁ bhavati ||
S04n3003:409: tadyathā mañjuśrīr asti mahāsāgare sarvābhiprāya paripūraṇaṁ nāma mahāmaṇiratnaṁ tad dhvajāgrāvabaddham |
S04n3003:413: tac ca mahā- maṇiratnaṁ na kalpayati na vikalpayati na cintayati na vicintayati,
S04n3003:415: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato na kalpayati na vikalpayati na cintayati na vicintayati,
S04n3003:444: na nāma na rūpaṁ na nimittam,
S04n3003:452: nādhyātmaṁ na bahirddhā nobhayam antareṇopa- labhyate |
S04n3003:453: atha ca mañjuśrīs tathāgatajñānaratnam adhyāśa- yapariśuddhaṁ mahākaruṇādhvajāgrāvabaddham,
S04n3003:454: tato yo yathāśayādhimuktaḥ sattvaḥ sa tathā dharmadeśanāṁ niś- carantīṁ saṁjānāti |
S04n3003:455: tatra ca tathāgataḥ samaḥ sarvatro- pekṣako nirvikalpo nirviśeṣaḥ ||
S04n3003:456: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ pratiśrutkām anyarutavijñaptito niś- carantīṁ sattvāḥ saṁjānanti |
S04n3003:457: sā ca nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā,
S04n3003:458: nādhyātmaṁ na bahirdhā nobhayam anta- reṇopalabhyate,
S04n3003:469: na pṛthivīdhātur nābdhātur na tejodhātur na vāyudhātuḥ,
S04n3003:492: atha ca mañjuśrīḥ pratiśrutkā nānārutaghoṣā nānādhyāśayānāṁ sattvānāṁ nānā- rutaghoṣavijñaptito niścarati |
S04n3003:494: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṁbuddho nātīto nā nāgato na pratyutpannaḥ,
S04n3003:506: na pṛthivīdhātur nābdhātur na tejodhātur na vāyudhātuḥ,
S04n3003:528: atha ca mañjuśrīr nānāvimuktāḥ sattvā nānādhyāśaya- vijñaptitas tathāgatavācaṁ niścarantīṁ saṁjānanti ||
S04n3003:529: tadyathāpi mañjuśrīḥ pṛthivīṁ niśritya pṛthivīṁ pratiṣthāya sarvatṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayo vṛddhiṁ virūḍhiṁ vaipu- lyatām āpadyante |
S04n3003:534: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgataṁ niśritya tathāgataṁ pratiṣṭhāya sarvasattvānāṁ sarvakuśalamūlāni vṛddhiṁ virūḍhiṁ vaipulyatām āpadyante |
S04n3003:535: śravakayānikānāṁ vā pratyekabuddhayānikānāṁ vā mahāyānikānāṁ vā, anyeṣāṁ (26)
S04n3003:537: yāni cānyāny antaśo mithyātva- niyatānāṁ kuśalamūlāni sarvāṇi tāni tathāgataṁ niśritya tathāgataṁ pratiṣṭhāya vṛddhiṁ virūḍhiṁ vaipulyatām āpadyante |
S04n3003:552: tadyathā mañjuśrīr ākāśaṁ sarvatra samaṁ nirvikalpaṁ nirviśeṣam,
S04n3003:570: atha mañjuśrīḥ sattvāḥ saṁsthānasya hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭatayākāśaṁ hīnotkṛṣṭaṁ saṁ- jānanti |
S04n3003:571: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'py arhan samyaksaṁbuddhaḥ sarvatra samo nirvikalpo nirviśeṣaḥ,
S04n3003:589: atha ca mañjuśrīr ye hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭāśayāḥ sattvās te hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭaṁ tathāgataṁ paśyanti |
S04n3003:592: asya sattvasya hīnāṁ rūpakāya- varṇapariniṣpattiṁ darśayiṣyāmi |
S04n3003:609: evaṁ śīlaṁ kṣāntiṁ vīryaṁ dhyānaṁ ca |
S04n3003:617: (29) na mañjuśrīs tathāgatasya nāmarūpaniruktyānusāri vijñānaṁ pravartate |
S04n3003:621: sarvadharmasamatākoṭī mañjuśrīs tathāgato'rhan samyak- sambuddhaḥ samaḥ sarvatra nirvikalpo nirviśeṣaḥ,
S04n3003:623: evam eva mañjuśrīḥ samāḥ sarva- dharmāḥ,
S04n3003:625: na hīnā na madhyā notkṛṣṭāḥ tat kasmād dhetoḥ |
S04n3003:627: yā mañjuśrīr anupalabdhiḥ sarvadharmāṇāṁ sā samatā,
S04n3003:633: evaṁ darśinaś ca viparyastāc cittacaitasikā na pravartante |
S04n3003:637: yadā na pracarati tadā na saṁcarati |
S04n3003:638: yadā na saṁcarati tadā na visarati |
S04n3003:653: yaś ca niyāmaprāptaḥ sa sarvadharma- manasikāraiḥ sārdhaṁ na saṁvasati |
S04n3003:654: yadā sarvadharma- manasikāraiḥ sārdhaṁ na saṁvasati tadā saṁvāśyo na bhavati |
S04n3003:655: yadā saṁvāśyo na bhavati tadā na bhavati na vibhavati |
S04n3003:656: yadā na bhavati na vibhavati tadā sthito dharma- prāpto bhavati |
S04n3003:657: yadā sthito dharmaprāpto bhavati tadā yoniśodharmaprayukto bhavati |
S04n3003:658: yoniśodharmaprayuktasya na kaścid dharmo 'sti yo na buddhadharmaḥ |
S04n3003:672: na tatra prayogo na pramāṇaṁ na phalasākṣātkriyā |
S04n3003:674: prakṛtiprabhāsvaraṁ cittaṁ tac cāgantukair upakleśair upakliśyate na ca prakṛtiḥ saṁkliśyate |
S04n3003:676: yā cāsaṁkleśatā tatra pratipakṣo nāsti yena pratipakṣeṇa kleśaprahāṇaṁ syāt |
S04n3003:678: na śuddhaḥ śudhyati śuddha eva saḥ |
S04n3003:681: yaś cāninditaḥ sa nandīprahāṇaṁ tatra sarvasnehā nirudhyante |
S04n3003:686: tathātā- pratiṣṭhitāś ca sarvadharmāḥ saṁskṛtā asaṁskṛtāś ca |
S04n3003:687: yā ca tathatā na tatra saṁskṛtaṁ nāsaṁskṛtaṁ na dvaya- prajñaptiḥ |
S04n3003:688: yatra na saṁskṛtaṁ nāsaṁskṛtam na dvaya- prajñaptiḥ sā tathatā |
S04n3003:695: yānajātutathatā sā na saṁkliśyate na viśudhyate |
S04n3003:696: yā na saṁkliśyate na viśudhyate sā notpadyate na nirudhyate |
S04n3003:697: yā notpadyate na nirudhyate sā nirvāṇena samā |
S04n3003:698: yā nirvāṇena samā sā na saṁsarati na parinirvāti |
S04n3003:699: yā na saṁsarati na parinirvāti sā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā |
S04n3003:700: yā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā sā na hīnā na madhyā notkṛṣṭā |
S04n3003:701: yā na hīnā na madhyā notkṛṣṭā sā tathatā |
S04n3003:705: tathaiva tathatā cātmā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram |
S04n3003:714: yad arthānugamajñānaṁ vijñanānugamaṁ cedam ucyate jñānam |
S04n3003:719: yārthānugamajñānena vijñānānugamajñānena nītārthānu- gamajñānena ca sā dharmatā |
S04n3003:720: yā dharmatā so 'rthaḥ l sā ca dharmatā dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā,
S04n3003:745: tatra bodhisattvena saṁkleśahetur vyavadāna- hetuś ca parijñātavyaḥ |
S04n3003:746: saṁkleśahetuviśuddhyā ca vyavadāna- viśuddhyā ca na sthātavyam |
S04n3003:772: sarve te dharmāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā niḥsattvā nirjīvā niṣpoṣā niṣpuruṣā niṣpudgalā asvāmikā aparigrahā nirvyāpārā māyo- pamā alakṣaṇā adhyātmopaśāntāḥ |
S04n3003:783: na kaścin mañjuśrīr dharmaḥ saṁvidyate yasyotpādo nirodho vā bhavet ||
S04n3003:785: tat kathaṁ bhagavaṁs tathāgatena bodhiḥ prāptā |
S04n3003:787: amūlāpratiṣṭhānā mañjuśrīs tathā- gatena bodhiḥ prāptā |
S04n3003:789: tatra katamad bhagavan mūlaṁ katamat pratiṣṭhānam |
S04n3003:792: tat tathā- gatena mañjuśrīr bodhisamatayā sarvadharmasamatā jñātā |
S04n3003:793: tasmād ucyate mañjuśrīr amūlāpratiṣṭhānā tathāgatena bodhir abhisaṁbuddheti ||
S04n3003:799: cakśur mañjuśrīḥ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca,
S04n3003:802: sa cakṣuḥ śūnyam iti parijñāya rūpeṣu na dhāvati,
S04n3003:804: evaṁ śrotraṁ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca,
S04n3003:807: sa śrotraṁ śūnyam iti parijñāya śabdeṣu na dhāvati,
S04n3003:812: sa ghrāṇaṁ śūnyam iti parijñāya gandheṣu na dhāvati,
S04n3003:817: sa jihvā śūnyeti parijñāya raseṣu na (36)
S04n3003:822: sa kāyaṁ śūnyam iti parijñāya spraṣṭavyeṣu na dhāvati,
S04n3003:824: mano mañjuśrīḥ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca,
S04n3003:827: sa manaḥ śūnyam iti parijñāya dharmeṣu na dhāvati,
S04n3003:842: tathā cāvatārṣīd yathā tathatāyā nāpāraṁ na pāraṁ sam- anupaśyati |
S04n3003:843: iti hy apārapāravigatāḥ sarvadharmās tathā- gatenābhisaṁbuddhāḥ |
S04n3003:862: bodhir mañjuśrīr nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā try- adhvasamā trimaṇḍalaparicchinnā |
S04n3003:867: sa cittamanovijñānāpratiṣṭhito na kalpayati na vikalpayati |
S04n3003:868: anavakalpayann avikalpayan nātītaṁ karoty anāgataṁ na manyate pratyutpannaṁ na prapañcayati ||
S04n3003:876: yan mañjuśrīr na citta- manovijñānavijñeyaṁ tad asaṁskṛtam |
S04n3003:877: asaṁskṛtam ucyate yatra notpādo na sthitir na vyayaḥ |
S04n3003:878: tad ucyate tri maṇḍala- pariśuddham asaṁskṛtam |
S04n3003:900: (39) bodhir mañjuśrīr na kāyenābhisambudhyate na cittena |
S04n3003:903: cittaṁ ca māyopamaṁ riktaṁ tuccham abhūtam asaṁskṛtam |
S04n3003:904: yo mañjuśrīr evaṁ kāyasya cittasya cāvabodhaḥ,
S04n3003:908: na mañjuśrīr bodhiḥ kāyena vā cittena vā dharmeṇa vā adharmeṇa vā bhūtena vābhūtena vā satyena vā mṛṣā vā vacanīyā ||
S04n3003:911: na mañjuśrīr bodhiḥ kiñcit sthānaṁ yena ca vyavahāraṁ gacchet |
S04n3003:912: yathā mañjuśrīr ākāśasthānam asaṁ- skṛtam anutpannam aniruddham avacanīyaṁ tathā mañju- śrīr bodhir asaṁskṛtāsthānānutpannāniruddhāvacanīyā |
S04n3003:913: yathā mañjuśrīr bhūtaṁ parigaveṣyamāṇaṁ sarvadharmair avacanīyam,
S04n3003:914: evam eva mañjuśrīr bodhir bhūtā parigaveṣya- māṇā sarvadharmair avacanīyā |
S04n3003:926: abhisaṁbudhya cakṣuṣo 'nanugrahāya rūpanupalabdhitaś cakṣurvijñānaṁ na pratiṣṭhitam |
S04n3003:928: ghrāṇān- anugrahāya gandhānupalabdhito ghrāṇavijñānaṁ na pra- tiṣṭhitam |
S04n3003:933: tenāpra- tiṣṭhitavijñānas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddha iti saṁ- khyāṁ gacchati |
S04n3003:935: katamāni catvāri yad uta rūpaṁ sattvānāṁ cittasya pratiṣṭhānam |
S04n3003:936: evaṁ vedanāsaṁjñāsaṁskārā mañjuśrīḥ sattvānāṁ cittasya pratiṣṭhānam |
S04n3003:937: tāni khalu punar imāni mañjuśrīś catvāri cittasya pratiṣṭhānāni tathāgatenānu- tpannāny aniruddhānīti jñātāni ||
S04n3003:938: bodhir iti mañjuśrīḥ śūnyatāyā etad adhivacanam |
S04n3003:939: yayā śūnyatayā mañjuśrīr bodhiḥ śūnyā tayā śūnyatayā mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmāḥ śūnyāḥ |
S04n3003:942: api tu khalu punar mañjuśrīr ekanayam etad yad uta śūnyatā vā bodhir vā |
S04n3003:943: yatra mañjuśrīr na śūnyatā na bodhiḥ,
S04n3003:944: na tatra mañjuśrīḥ kiṁcid dvayaṁ yena dvayena śūnyatā vā bodhir vā dvidhākriyate |
S04n3003:946: advayā mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmā alakṣaṇā advaidhīkārā anā- māno 'nimittāś cittamanovijñānāpagatā anutpannā ani- (42)
S04n3003:947: ruddhā anācārā apracārā asamudācārā anakṣarā aghoṣāḥ |
S04n3003:948: yat punar ucyate mañjuśrīḥ śūnyam iti,
S04n3003:950: na punar atra mañjuśrīḥ para- mārthataḥ kaścid dharma upalabhyate yaḥ śūnyam ity ucyate |
S04n3003:951: yathā mañjuśrīr ākāśam ākāśam ity ucyate,

S04n3003:1441: (9) sacen mañjuśrīr bodhisattvo daśasu dikṣu sarvaloka- dhātuṣu sarvasattvān bodhicitte pratiṣṭhāpayet |
S04n3003:1442: yo vānyo bodhisattva ekaṁ sattvam avaivartikatve pratiṣṭhāpayet |
S04n3003:1444: (67) (10) sacen mañjuśrīr bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattvān avaivartikatve pratiṣṭhāpayet |
S04n3003:1445: yo vānyo bodhisattva imaṁ dharmaparyāyam adhimuktaḥ likhāpayitvā parebhyo vistareṇa saṁprakāśayet,
S04n3003:1446: antaśa ekaṁ sattvam apy asmin dharmaparyāye 'vatārayet |
S04n3003:1448: atha khalu bhagavāṁs tasyāṁ velāyām imā gāthā abhāṣat |
S04n3003:1449: yo bodhisattvo daśabuddhakoṭināṁ saddharmaṁ dhārayet kṣayāntakāle |
S04n3003:1450: sūtraṁ ca yo 'nyaḥ śṛṇuyāt sagauravād idaṁ tataḥ puṇyamahāntaṁ viśeṣayet || 1 ||
S04n3003:1452: yo buddhakoṭīdaśa pūjayed ṛddhyā samākramya daśāsu dikṣu |
S04n3003:1453: vandāpayet sa puruṣāṁś ca sarvān kṛtvā kṛpāṁ sarvasukheṣv agṛddhaḥ || 2 ||
S04n3003:1455: (68) yaś cedaṁ sūtraṁ jinadharmasūcakaṁ parasya deśeta muhūrtakaṁ pi |
S04n3003:1456: prasannacittaḥ sugatasya śāsana idaṁ tataḥ puṇyaphalaṁ viśiṣyate || 3 ||
S04n3003:1459: sa tīkṣṇaprajñaś ca mahābalaś ca buddhāna bhūmiṁ labhate ca śīghram || 4 ||
S04n3003:1461: kathāṁ śruṇitvā sugatānam īdṛśaṁ saṁśrāvayed yaś ca dvitīyasattve |
S04n3003:1462: teṣāṁ ca buddhāna narottamānāṁ parinirvṛtānāṁ nirupādhiśeṣe || 5 ||
S04n3003:1466: chatraiḥ patākais tatha ghaṇṭaśabdaiḥ pariṇāhavante hi yathā bhavāgram || 6 ||
S04n3003:1468: (69) icche tv ayaṁ kaścid iha bodhisattvaḥ sūtraṁ śruṇitvā ima evarūpam |
S04n3003:1469: kāye pratiṣṭhāpayi pustake vā idaṁ tataḥ puṇyaphalaṁ viśiṣyate || 7 ||
S04n3003:1471: yo bodhisattvo imu dharmu dhārayed apanītamāccharyamalo viśāradaḥ |
S04n3003:1472: puṇyaṁ bhavet tasya hi aprameyaṁ labheta bodhiṁ ca yathepsitena || 8 ||
S04n3003:1474: idaṁ hi sūtraṁ sugataiḥ praśastaṁ parigṛhītaṁ bahubodhisattvaiḥ |
S04n3003:1475: tathāgatānām iha-m-ātmabhāva ākāśadhātve hi sarveṣu darśitaḥ || 9 ||
S04n3003:1477: (70) idam avocad bhagavān āttamanā āryamañjuśrīr bodhi- sattvaḥ,
S04n3003:1478: te ca daśadiganantāparyantāśeṣalokadhātusaṁnipatitā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā it ca mahāśrāvakāḥ sadevamā- nuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhya- nandann iti || ||
S04n3003:1482: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṁ teṣāṁ tathāgato hy avadat |
S04n3003:1483: teṣāṁ ca yo nirodha evaṁvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ ||
S04n3003:1484: deyadharmo 'yaṁ pravaramahāyānayāyino bhikṣuśīladhvajasya ca tatra puṇyaṁ tad bhavatv ācāryopādhyāyamātāpitṛpūrvaṁ- gamaṁ kṛtvā sakalasattvarāśer anuttarajñānaphalāvāptaya iti ||
